description:
A citizen of the space colony Shangri-La, Beecha Oleg originally worked alongside Judau Ashta as a junk dealer, but through a series of events becomes a Hyaku Shiki pilot mobile suit pilot for the Argama. Initially his unhappiness with military life and rivalry with Judau cause him to temporarily switch sides with Mondo Agake until the abuse they suffered from Gottn and the other crew members of the Endra made both of them realize they were happier on the Argama. However, as the conflict continues, Beecha grows out of his childish ways. Assuming command of the Argama`s successor battleship, the Nahel Argama, he even finds the courage to express his affection for long time love interest Elle Vianno. 
Source: gundam.wikia.com
name: Beecha Oleg
